ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: Sorry for the foul comment
ygData.msgSnippet: Thank you Darkfox.  I appreciate the appology.  And I do understand how that impression can be made.  I just wanted to state why my sig is what it is. Lyrnia
ygData.messageBody:
Thank you Darkfox. I appreciate the appology. And I do understand how that
impression can be made. I just wanted to state why my sig is what it is.

Lyrnia Jongleur
Bard of Norrath since Beta 2
----- Original Message -----
From: <blitz_krieg@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, September 01, 2000 12:28 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Re: Sorry for the foul comment


>
> I'm gonna apologize, Lyrnia, because in the context it was an
> insensitive comment. My comment wasn't really directed at you in
> particular but in general when I see people post "Blah Blah since
> Beta 1" as part of their sig line, it usually comes when they're
> contradicting someone else's opinion... To me, it seems like they're
> saying, "I've been around longer than you, so I know." I really
> don't buy into that philosophy and personally don't think there's
> anything more special about a Level 60 Bard compared to a Level 25
> Bard. Or someone who's been playing since 4000 BC vs. someone who
> bought the game yesterday. Obviously, not everyone who uses a
> similar sig is implying the same thing and that's where some more
> information would have been important to illustrate what I meant.
> Sorry for what looked like a cheap shot.
>
> Darkfox Reven'tsol
> Bard of Kunark since... well, Kunark came out. :)
>
>
>
>
> > Lyrnia Jongleur
> > "Bard of Norrath since Beta 2"
>
>
> Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
>
>
